page.title: 14Leisure/Hobbies
page.content: We devised a questionnaire to find out what people enjoy doing in their leisure time .We noted down our own interests and the interests of three other people.After collecting the information we found that we had details about the leisure pursuits of 68 different people. 1. The most popular leisure pursuit in our survey was swimming. 2.The second most popular leisure pursuit were reading and computer work. 3.These were closely followed by roller skating, knitting, cycling, drawing, gardening, cooking, sewing, and fishing ,in that order. 4.Other leisure interests included rygby, playing in woods, painting, embroidering, stamp collecting,
